name: "Friday Night Monkey Fights" the Mobile App!
blurb: This KickStarter project is to fund the development of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights" mobile app for iOS.

rewards.reward: $1.00 Executive Producer- Spit Bucket Sap Status! (Unlimited)\r\nEnjoy exclusive \u201cSpit Bucket Sap\u201d status and one exclusive print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and one free gift download of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$5.00 Executive Producer- Monkey Mate Status! (Unlimited)\r\nEnjoy exclusive \u201cMonkey Mate\u201d status and one exclusive print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and one free gift download of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$10.00 Executive Producer- Ring Girl/Ring Boy Status! (Unlimited)\r\nNaming rights to a coveted \u201cRing Girl/Ring Boy\u201d character in the game. This character will carry your name as he or she struts the ring with the all important ring card between rounds! And, one exclusive print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and one free gift download of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$25.00 Executive Producer- Sparring Partner Status! (Unlimited)\r\nNaming rights to a humble "Sparring Partner" character in the game. This character will carry your name as he or she receives beat-downs, thrashings, and whoopins of all kinds to prove that he or she is a worthy training partner and deserving of a "shot" at a real fight in the \u201cMonkey Mayhem Arena\u201d! Join "Punch Drunk" Peterson and the other sparring partners in and out of the ring and see \u201cFriday Night Monkey Fights\u201d from a unique Monkey perspective! And, one exclusive print of your character, one exclusive print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and one free gift download of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$50.00 Executive Producer- Trainer Status! (Twenty Available)\r\nNaming rights to an exclusive "Trainer" character in the game. This character will carry your name as he works tirelessly to train the next World Champion! Join "Mick Monkey" and the other trainers in and out of the ring and see \u201cFriday Night Monkey Fights\u201d from a unique Monkey perspective! And, one exclusive print of your character, one exclusive print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and one free gift download of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$100.00 Executive Producer- Legend Status! (Ten Available)\r\nNaming and character design rights to a featured "Legends" character in the game. This character will carry your name and look exactly how YOU say! That's right, it is up to you, you're own guy or gal! You pick your name and face, but hopefully not your nose! And to make it even better, YOUR character will be included in the "Legends" fighter division! You will even have a "Legends" poster on the wall at the "Monkey Mayhem Arena". And, one exclusive print of your character, one exclusive print of your character\u2019s \u201cLegends\u201d poster, one exclusive print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and five free gift downloads of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$1,000.00 Executive Producer- Contender Status! (Nineteen Available)\r\nNaming and character design rights to a principal character in the game. This character will carry your name and look exactly how YOU say! That's right, it is up to you, you're own guy or gal! You pick your name and face, but hopefully not your nose! And to make it even better, YOUR character will be one of the \u201cTop Twenty Contenders\u201d! Everyone will have to go through YOU to get to the champ! Join the other \u201cFriday Night Monkey Fights\u201d contenders and beat the breaks off of any Monkey who dares challenge you and your inevitable shot at the title.  And, one exclusive framed print of your character, one exclusive framed print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and five free gift downloads of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$5,000.00 Executive Producer- Promoter Status! (One Available)\r\nNaming and character design rights to a principal character in the game. This character will carry your name and look exactly how YOU say! That's right, it is up to you, you're own guy or gal! You pick your name and face, but hopefully not your nose! And to make it even better, YOUR character will be featured as the exclusive \u201cPromoter\u201d of all \u201cFriday Night Monkey Fights\u201d productions! Every fighter, trainer, ring girl or ring boy will be in your employ! Stand alone atop \u201cFriday Night Monkey Fights\u201d as the top banana and watch the action from the best seat in the house. And, one exclusive framed print of your character, one exclusive framed print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and ten free gift downloads of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.

$10,000.00 Executive Producer- #1 Contender Status! (One Available)\r\nNaming and character design rights to a principal character in the game. This character will carry your name and look exactly how YOU say! That's right, it is up to you, you're own guy or gal! You pick your name and face, but hopefully not your nose! And to make it even better, YOUR character will hold the default reigning \u201c#1 Contender Status\u201d in the world! Everyone will have to go through YOU to get to the champ! Stand alone atop the \u201cFriday Night Monkey Fights\u201d contenders and beat the breaks off of any Monkey who dares to challenge your shot at the title. And, one exclusive framed print of your character, one exclusive framed print of the original "Friday Night Monkey Fights" drawing depicting a pugilistic battle between "Tonka" Tim and "Imp" Jones Jr. and ten free gift downloads of the official "Friday Night Monkey Fights!" app! App download to be delivered at completion of Stage Three, all other rewards will be delivered at the end of each individual Stage.
